nodes.excerpt: Ennerate (YC W21) does business valuations for small and medium sized traditional businesses (plumbers, manufacturing, etc.) for 5x faster and 10x cheaper than existing services. Users upload financials, take a survey, and our models generate the valuation.
nodes.title: Ennerate - Automated business valuations for 'Main Street' companies
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Ennerate（YC W21）为中小型传统企业（水电工、制造业等）做商业估值，比现有服务快5倍，便宜10倍。用户上传财务资料，进行调查，我们的模型就会生成估值。
localize.tagline: 为 "大街 "公司进行自动商业评估。

localize.description: Ennerate（YC W21）爲中小型傳統企業（水電工、製造業等）做商業估值，比現有服務快5倍，便宜10倍。用戶上傳財務資料，進行調查，我們的模型就會生成估值。
localize.tagline: 爲 "大街 "公司進行自動商業評估。

nodes.excerpt: Beatflyer is the most powerful social media posts creator with a wide-range of effects which can also sync to the music. Import your designs, design from scratch, or start from one of the crafted templates.

nodes.excerpt: Campah is the easiest way to tie all your content together. Simply claim a URL, set up your link cards, and share your link! You'll have a live page in a minute.

nodes.excerpt: The Self Stack is everything you need to build a transparent, user obsessed digital studio. No Google. No Facebook. No trust violations. This is agency creativity without sacrificing your soul.

nodes.excerpt: Slack Connect allows you to send direct messages to people outside your company, simplifying the way you work with partners. Use this feature to seamlessly schedule meetings, sign documents and quickly collaborate on important tasks without ever leaving Slack.

localize.description: Slack Connect 允許您直接向公司以外的人員發送消息，簡化了您與合作伙伴的合作方式。使用此功能可無縫安排會議、簽署文件並快速協作完成重要任務，而無需離開Slack。

nodes.excerpt: Focus on one important task today. You decide what to focus on. After you set today's task you can't change or delete it. Keep a streak of days you finished your daily task.
nodes.title: TinyDo - One task today
nodes.author: Igor Dyachuk

localize.description: 今天专注于一项重要任务。你决定专注于什么。当你设定了今天的任务后，你就不能更改或删除它。保持你完成每日任务的天数的连贯性。
localize.tagline: 今天的一项任务

localize.description: 今天專注於一項重要任務。你決定專注於什麼。當你設定了今天的任務後，你就不能更改或刪除它。保持你完成每日任務的天數的連貫性。
localize.tagline: 今天的一項任務

UI Coach helps you create better designs and grow your skills by allowing you to get the feedback you need when you need it most.

nodes.excerpt: Coupler.io synchronizes data between Airtable, Clockify, Shopify, Trello, etc., and Google Sheets allowing you to bring data into a single place and customize your reporting. Try Coupler.io Free-forever plan now and auto-import up to 50K rows per month!

localize.description: Coupler.io可以在Airtable、Clockify、Shopify、Trello等和Google Sheets之间同步数据，让您将数据集中到一个地方，并自定义您的报告。现在就试试Coupler.io免费计划，每月自动导入多达5万行的数据。

nodes.title: Slideshare - Share presentations and resources, easily
nodes.author: James Quinn

localize.description: 不要让你的听众等待后续的电子邮件! 分享幻灯片或资源从未如此简单。上传您的内容，将您的自定义二维码添加到任何演示文稿中，并简化共享。目前所有早期用户均可免费使用****。
localize.tagline: 轻松分享演示文稿和资源

localize.description: 不要讓你的聽衆等待後續的電子郵件! 分享幻燈片或資源從未如此簡單。上傳您的內容，將您的自定義二維碼添加到任何演示文稿中，並簡化共享。目前所有早期用戶均可免費使用****。
localize.tagline: 輕鬆分享演示文稿和資源

nodes.excerpt: Think of Speeko like a gym membership for your voice. Get instant feedback on your speaking style, and track your progress over time. Personalized activities help you build new skills in just 5 minutes a day. You'll be speaking with confidence in no time!
nodes.title: Speeko - A.I. powered public speaking and presenter coach
nodes.author: Nico Aguilar

localize.description: 想想看，Speeko就像您的声音的健身会员。您可以获得关于您的口语风格的即时反馈，并随着时间的推移追踪您的进步。个性化的活动帮助您在每天5分钟内培养新技能。您很快就会变得自信满满。
localize.tagline: A.I.Powered Public Speaking and presenter coach (A.I.动力公共演讲和主持人教练)

localize.description: 想想看，Speeko就像您的聲音的健身會員。您可以獲得關於您的口語風格的即時反饋，並隨着時間的推移追蹤您的進步。個性化的活動幫助您在每天5分鐘內培養新技能。您很快就會變得自信滿滿。
localize.tagline: A.I.Powered Public Speaking and presenter coach (A.I.動力公共演講和主持人教練)
